content: jump start your creativity with this toad-ally adorable no-sew crochet frog pattern make it without cheeks for a complete no-sew experience or add cheeks for a low-sew option and extra cute factor this quick and easy amigurumi frog works up in under an hour using plush yarn making it perfect for markets/craft fairs or a fun gift idea for a frog lover the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * super bulky yarn * dk weight yarn for the optional cheeks * 4 5mm crochet hook * 2 5mm crochet hook for the cheeks if using * 8mm safety eyes * 4 ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss * a small amount of worsted weight yarn for the neck bow * polyester fiberfill * stitch marker yarn needle scissors * optional fabric glue the finished item measure approximately 2 5 6 5cm tall item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/crochet-frog-pattern/
